issue.title: [Docs] Add canonical url to the docs
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14055](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14055). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
As a help in consolidating links/searches to the main pages, we can add `<link rel="canonical" href="..." />` in the head of the doc pages. This is actually something that sphinx supports with the `html_baseurl` option.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14055?focusedCommentId=17418313) by Kouhei Sutou (kou):*
Issue resolved by pull request 11200
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/11200>
